descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Karakuri Ninja VR is a ninja action game in which players fight using weapons and ninjutsu in a virtual reality world.

The game immerses you in exciting battles against ninja robots and golems in stages inspired by Sengoku-era Japan.

[media]

Each stage features a variety of weapons such as Japanese swords, kunai, and shuriken, as well as items that enhance weapons to advance the battle situation.

[media]

Players who are skilled ninja can use special ninjutsu such as energy balls and aura shields.

[media]

However, enemies also attack with fire and lightning ninjutsu. In a ninja fight, one must carefully observe the enemy's actions and never miss the moment to strike.

[media]

In Karakuri Ninja VR, as you progress through the stages, more powerful enemies will appear. Hone your swordsmanship and ninjutsu skills and face them bravely.

The game immerses you in exciting battles against ninja robots and golems in stages inspired by Sengoku-era Japan.
